sentence: Earlier on Monday, one of his rival candidates, former Arizona National Guard leader Mick McGuire, called on Brnovich to release records from the State Bar’s investigation of the complaints filed by Secretary of State Katie Hobbs and the Arizona Board of Regents.

title: AG Mark Brnovich wants to send troops to the border (and himself to the Senate)

sentence: Secretary of State Katie Hobbs, the Democratic frontrunner, called on the Senate to raise the limit and save K-12 schools from "this manufactured funding crisis."
author: Jeremy Duda
title: No Republican candidates for Arizona governor are calling for school cuts to be stopped

sentence: “I look forward to once again defending the voters of Arizona and defeating this ridiculous attempt to undermine our elections,” said Democratic Secretary of State Katie Hobbs, a Democrat and a defendant in the case.
author: Jonathan J. Cooper
title: Republicans file lawsuit to end vote-by-mail absentee voting in Arizona

sentence: Republican Sen. Vince Leach introduced the bill after Democratic Secretary of State Katie Hobbs filed a bar complaint against Republican Attorney General Mark Brnovich.

sentence: Republican Sen. Vince Leach introduced the bill after Democratic Secretary of State Katie Hobbs filed a bar complaint against Republican Attorney General Mark Brnovich.

sentence: Democratic gubernatorial frontrunner Katie Hobbs is calling for a handful of new tax credits and sales tax exemptions aimed at helping working families, including child care assistance and a state-level version of a recently expired federal child tax credit.
author: Jeremy Duda
title: Hobbs: Arizona should have state child tax credit, more help for working families

sentence: "As governor, I would not only veto this extremist bill, I would also trust Arizona women to make health care decisions alongside doctors, not politicians," said Democratic gubernatorial candidate and current Arizona Secretary of State Katie Hobbs.
author: Michael McDaniel
title: Transgender and abortion bills highlight growing division of Arizona lawmakers

sentence: Rep. Richard Andrade has withdrawn his endorsement of Democratic gubernatorial frontrunner Katie Hobbs over her role in the firing of former Senate staffer Talonya Adams and is now backing Marco Lopez, one of her rivals in the primary elections.
author: Jeremy Duda
title: Arizona Rep. Andrade un-endorses Hobbs, switches to Lopez

sentence: Despite all of this, and despite Republican officials in Maricopa County agreeing the election was conducted fairly, Trump allies running for office in Arizona have continued to assert Democrats somehow stole the election, with gubernatorial candidate Kari Lake even calling for the arrest of Secretary of State Katie Hobbs.
author: Matthew Chapman
title: Trump's 'Big Lie' demolished again as new audit of Arizona vote shows no fraud: report

sentence: In a letter to Arizona Secretary of State Katie Hobbs, Ducey explained that this type of surgery is irreversible and has a lasting impact on a person’s life.

title: GOP Rep Says People Should Hit a Certain Age Before Making ‘Life-Altering’ Decisions About Gender Identity

sentence: Democratic Arizona gubernatorial candidate Katie Hobbs refused to answer Sunday whether abortions conducted in Arizona should have a time limit based on the baby’s gestational age.

title: Arizona Democratic Gubernatorial Candidate Wants No Limits On Abortion

sentence: PHOENIX (AP) — Republican Arizona Attorney General Mark Brnovich is joining with Republican Party officials to sue Democratic Secretary of State Katie Hobbs in an escalation of a dispute over the election procedures manual she is required to complete.

title: Brnovich sues Hobbs in dispute over election procedures
